li: Typepad is a highly reliable blogging platform.,It provides various beautiful and attractive templates.,It helps us to carry more traffic on our blog.,Typepad's basic service plan is available at the cost of $8.95/month.,It supports fewer features as compared to WordPress.,Medium provides public as well as private post options.,It uses an activity-based approach for content promotion.,It is the best platform for bloggers, writers, journalists, and content creators.,It helps us to create and publish content on the web without efforts.,Mastodon supports multiple languages.,It is a decentralized platform.,It as an ad-free and non-algorithmic platform.,It supports a big community.,Mastodon creates a little confusion for the beginners.,Pillowfort allows users to create communities and follow other users.,It allows users to set passwords and content control on their uploaded content.,It is a user-friendly platform.,Users need to pay $5 for creating an account with the Pillowfort.,Newgrounds help us to upload games, movies, and memes.,It allows developers and artists to share their creativity.,It is an open-source and independent platform.,Newgrounds provides bad flash animations.,Ghost allows us to insert images, Markdown, or HTML easily.,It is a fast, secure, simple, and responsive blogging platform.,It can be run in two variants.
